cause.description:
This is not a money making scheme. In fact, I don't want nor need any donations. This is just a way to bring the idea to of self-mutilation to the forefront of your mindset. This is an overlooked health issue because so few people report it to therapists and other medical professionals. Let this be a way for us to get the word out and possibly provide some success stories about overcoming these important issues.
1. To provide information about self-mutialtion
2. To provide a forum for those who wish to speak out against it
3. To bring SM to the conscious of the world
cause.mission: educate the people of the problem of self-mutilation.
cause.name: Self-Mutilation Awareness and Prevention
